title: Push JSON data into an App or to Spreadsheet file
author: n8n Team
workflow_json:
{"nodes":[{"id":"3d58a8a9-50dd-4f06-8955-c73c30b64225","name":"HTTP Request","type":"n8n-nodes-base.httpRequest","position":[380,240],"parameters":{"url":"https://randomuser.me/api/","options":{}},"typeVersion":2},{"id":"ceaf349d-3fa6-44b0-9238-2998ce026175","name":"Spreadsheet File","type":"n8n-nodes-base.spreadsheetFile","position":[920,480],"parameters":{"options":{"fileName":"users_spreadsheet"},"operation":"toFile","fileFormat":"csv"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"a8cd75a4-1b2c-4e1f-bd96-0377cc156025","name":"Note","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[680,-14],"parameters":{"width":523,"height":302,"content":"### JSON to Google Sheets
We map data from the HTTP Request directly in the `Google Sheets` node, so we don't need a `Set` node before to transform the incoming data."},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"a81fb564-f34a-4fd8-9758-6a2fb9bac6e0","name":"Note1","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[680,340],"parameters":{"width":522,"height":299,"content":"### JSON to .CSV
We use the `Set` node to trim down the data that we convert to CSV file format (and flatten it from it's previous object-like data structure). Change settings in `Spreadsheet File` node to convert to .xls etc."},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"003a33f1-e060-4373-a97a-0be2c4a5e2a1","name":"When clicking "Execute Workflow"","type":"n8n-nodes-base.manualTrigger","position":[140,240],"parameters":{},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"b63a19f6-008c-4a38-8112-073433a2d125","name":"Sticky Note","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-340,20],"parameters":{"width":377.1993316649719,"height":590.2004455566864,"content":"## 👋 How to use this template
This template shows how you can load JSON data from an API and load it into an App (Google Sheets) or convert to a file. Here's how to use it:

1. Open the `Google Sheets` node and add a credential (or disabled the node)
2. Click the `Execute Workflow` button, then double click the nodes to see their input and output data

### To customize this template to you needs:
1. Swap `When clicking "Execute Workflow"` and the `HTTP Request` node with an App trigger. If we don't have a Native app trigger, just replace `When clicking "Execute Workflow"` with a [Schedule trigger](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.scheduletrigger/).
2. Disable or remove parts of the workflow that are not relevant to your usecase.
4. Activate the workflow

2"}},"typeVersion":4},{"id":"5886f624-ab5a-4cd2-be2b-b166f617f77c","name":"Set","type":"n8n-nodes-base.set","position":[720,480],"parameters":{"values":{"string":[{"name":"Full Name","value":"={{ readme:
This workflow template shows how to load JSON data into a workflow and push that data into an App or convert it into a Spreadsheet file.

Specifically, this workflow shows how to make a generic API request that returns JSON. It then shows how to load that into a **Google Sheets** spreadsheet, or convert it to **.CSV file** format. However, you can use the general pattern to load data into any app or convert to any spreadsheet file format (such as .xlsx).
readme_zh:
此工作流模板展示了如何将JSON数据加载到工作流中，并将该数据推送至应用程序或转换为电子表格文件。

具体而言，该工作流演示了如何发起一个返回JSON的通用API请求。随后展示了如何将这些数据载入**Google Sheets**电子表格，或转换为**.CSV文件**格式。当然，您也可以运用这一通用模式将数据加载至任何应用程序，或转换为任意电子表格文件格式（例如.xlsx）。
title_zh: 将JSON数据推送到应用程序或电子表格文件中
workflow_json_zh:
{"nodes":[{"id":"3d58a8a9-50dd-4f06-8955-c73c30b64225","name":"HTTP Request","type":"n8n-nodes-base.httpRequest","position":[380,240],"parameters":{"url":"https://randomuser.me/api/","options":{}},"typeVersion":2},{"id":"ceaf349d-3fa6-44b0-9238-2998ce026175","name":"Spreadsheet File","type":"n8n-nodes-base.spreadsheetFile","position":[920,480],"parameters":{"options":{"fileName":"users_spreadsheet"},"operation":"toFile","fileFormat":"csv"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"a8cd75a4-1b2c-4e1f-bd96-0377cc156025","name":"Note","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[680,-14],"parameters":{"width":523,"height":302,"content":"### JSON转Google表格
我们直接在`Google表格`节点中映射来自HTTP请求的数据，因此无需预先使用`Set`节点来转换传入的数据。"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"a81fb564-f34a-4fd8-9758-6a2fb9bac6e0","name":"Note1","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[680,340],"parameters":{"width":522,"height":299,"content":"### JSON转.CSV  
我们使用`Set`节点精简数据，将其转换为CSV文件格式（并将其从原有的类对象数据结构扁平化）。如需转换为.xls等格式，请在`Spreadsheet File`节点中调整设置。"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"003a33f1-e060-4373-a97a-0be2c4a5e2a1","name":"When clicking "Execute Workflow"","type":"n8n-nodes-base.manualTrigger","position":[140,240],"parameters":{},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"b63a19f6-008c-4a38-8112-073433a2d125","name":"Sticky Note","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-340,20],"parameters":{"width":377.1993316649719,"height":590.2004455566864,"content":"## 👋 如何使用此模板  
本模板展示了如何从API加载JSON数据并导入应用（如Google Sheets）或转换为文件。使用方法如下：  

1. 打开`Google Sheets`节点并添加凭证（或禁用该节点）  
2. 点击`执行工作流`按钮，然后双击节点查看其输入和输出数据  

### 按需定制模板：  
1. 将`点击"执行工作流"时`和`HTTP请求`节点替换为应用触发器。若无原生应用触发器，可用[定时触发器](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.scheduletrigger/)替代  
2. 禁用或移除与您需求无关的工作流部分  
3. 启用工作流
